description: Manage App Compliance Automation Tool reports.

commands.name: az acat report create
commands.summary: Create a new AppComplianceAutomation report or update an exiting AppComplianceAutomation report.
commands.syntax:
az acat report create --report-name
                      --resources
                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                      [--offer-guid]
                      [--storage-info]
                      [--time-zone]
                      [--trigger-time]

commands.name: az acat report delete
commands.syntax:
az acat report delete --report-name
                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                      [--yes]

commands.name: az acat report download
commands.summary: Download compliance needs from snapshot, like: Compliance Report, Resource List.
commands.syntax:
az acat report download --download-type {ComplianceDetailedPdfReport, CompliancePdfReport, ComplianceReport, ResourceList}
                        --report-name
                        --snapshot-name
                        [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                        [--offer-guid]
                        [--tenant]

commands.name: az acat report list
commands.summary: List the AppComplianceAutomation report list for the tenant.

commands.name: az acat report show
commands.summary: Get the AppComplianceAutomation report and its properties.

commands.name: az acat report update
commands.summary: Update a new AppComplianceAutomation report or update an exiting AppComplianceAutomation report.
commands.syntax:
az acat report update --report-name
                      [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                      [--offer-guid]
                      [--resources]
                      [--storage-info]
                      [--time-zone]
                      [--trigger-time]

commands.name: az acat report wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
